abstract: Sara Lee was not convinced that JBS, a major meat processor, could secure adequate financing for a takeover, according to people briefed on the matter.
snippet: Sara Lee was not convinced that JBS, a major meat processor, could secure adequate financing for a takeover, according to people briefed on the matter.
lead_paragraph: Sara Lee is leaning toward splitting itself into its meats and coffee businesses after rejecting a takeover bid by JBS of Brazil, people briefed on the matter told DealBook on Thursday.

headline.main: Sara Lee Favors Split After Rebuffing JBS

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced and Evelyn M. Rusli
